sentences.en: A blueberry pancake, corn flakes, and a glass of orange juice.
sentences.cn: 蓝莓松饼 、 玉米片和一杯橙汁.

sentences.en: All ready to be eaten with pancake syrup and butter. Yum Yum!
sentences.cn: 配上牛油和香饼糖浆,又香又好吃. 太棒了!

sentences.en: Can you describe Pancake , your nang'ek in " Buang Rai Prai Ruk "
sentences.cn: 你可以形容一下pancake吗?《爱情与阴谋的较量 》 的女主角.

sentences.en: Do I put pieces of meat on this thin pancake?
sentences.cn: 把肉放在薄饼上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Great with toast french fry fry or potato pancake.
sentences.cn: 搭配以烤面包片,炸薯条,或土头饼.

sentences.en: He turned the pancake over with a strong flick of his wrist.
sentences.cn: 他一抖腕子就把饼翻过来了.

sentences.en: Most of the province is as flat as a pancake.
sentences.cn: 那省的大部分地区地势平坦.

sentences.en: My home state of Illinois is flat as a pancake.
sentences.cn: 我的故乡伊利诺伊州一马平川。

sentences.en: Spread some of the filling over each pancake.
sentences.cn: 在每个薄煎饼上摊上一些馅。

sentences.en: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.cn: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.en: The ingredients a pancake are milk, eggs, flour and butter.
sentences.cn: 作蛋饼的材料是牛奶 、 蛋 、 面粉和黄油.

sentences.en: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.cn: 包装盒上说烤焙与薄饼面料混合，但没有添加一些主要调料，薄饼是不好吃的。

sentences.en: The surprise party turned out as flat as a pancake, ie was very disappointing.
sentences.cn: 这次本想让大家感到惊奇的聚会到头来却十分扫兴.

sentences.en: The whole landscape looked as flat as a pancake.
They are so-called “ pancake people ”, they no longer concentrate their energies on one area of interest, but instead choose to spread themselves thinly over a large area.
sentences.cn: 他们就是所谓的“煎饼人”，他们不再将精力专注于某一个感兴趣的领域，而是让自己的关注点浅浅地散布在一个很大的范围。

sentences.en: Use the white sesame and black sesame to make the pancake.
sentences.cn: 用白芝麻和黑芝麻做成小薄饼.

sentences.en: We have rice, noodles, steamed buns, dumplings or pancake.
sentences.cn: 主食有米饭 、 面条 、 馒头 、 饺子和煎饼等.

words.tran_cn: 薄烤饼；粉饼；平降（全称pancake landing）

trans.tran_cn: 烙饼，薄煎饼，粉饼，[航]平降，平坠
trans.tran_en: a thin flat round cake made from flour, milk, and eggs, that has been cooked in a flat pan and is eaten hot
